ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Error"), AND ( $User.Username != "anegron@newmarketinc.com", $User.Username != "ttoro@newmarketinc.com", $Profile.Name != "NI PSA Administrator", $Profile.Name != "System Administrator", $Profile.Name != "NI Subscription Management"))
